trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control that is hosted in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo que está alojado num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridTextBox and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> work together so that users can directly edit values in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control column.
trans-unit.target: O DataGridTextBox e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>funcionam em conjunto para que os utilizadores podem editar diretamente os valores existentes num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>coluna do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, and is designed to host the DataGridTextBox, which derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>e foi concebido para alojar o DataGridTextBox, que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the properties, events, and methods of the base control, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> events with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Além das propriedades, eventos e métodos do controlo base, pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>eventos com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"></xref> is in a mode that allows either editing or navigating.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox"> </xref> está num modo que permite a edição ou navegar.

trans-unit.source: The IsInEditOrNavigateMode property is used within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyMessage%2A> to determine how to process key press events, to check the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade IsInEditOrNavigateMode utilizada dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyMessage%2A>determinar como processar os eventos de chave prima, para verificar o estado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if one of the navigation (arrow) keys is pressed, the appropriate action for the state of the control must occur.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se uma das chaves de navegação (seta) é premida, as ações apropriadas para o estado do controlo devem ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the controls is in navigation mode, and editing has not begun; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Não foi iniciada se os controlos está no modo de navegação e, editar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the key pressed is processed further (for example, to navigate, or escape).
trans-unit.target: Indica se a chave premida é processada adicional (por exemplo, para navegar ou escape).

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado quando um controlo recebe uma mensagem de teclado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that contains the key data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, transmitida por referência, que contém os dados de chave.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is consumed, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to if the key is further processed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave é consumida, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para se a chave é processada.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> to which this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control belongs.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> para que esta <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> controlo pertence.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control that hosts the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controlo que aloja o controlo.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.
